    • Method Detail

      • AllLeaves

        public boolean AllLeaves(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.bullet.collision.btDbvtNode node)
        Callback method for btDbvt.collideKDOP(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.bullet.collision.btDbvtNode, com.badlogic.gdx.physics.bullet.linearmath.btVector3, java.nio.FloatBuffer, int, com.badlogic.gdx.physics.bullet.collision.ICollide). The bounding volume tree node in the parameter is inside the camera frustum, as are any collision objects it contains.
        Overrides:
        AllLeaves in class com.badlogic.gdx.physics.bullet.collision.ICollide
        Parameters:
        node - A bounding volume tree node, the children of which are all inside the camera frustum.

      • Descent

        public boolean Descent(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.bullet.collision.btDbvtNode node)
        Callback for btDbvt.collideOCL(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.bullet.collision.btDbvtNode, com.badlogic.gdx.physics.bullet.linearmath.btVector3, java.nio.FloatBuffer, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector3, int, com.badlogic.gdx.physics.bullet.collision.ICollide, boolean). This method must check if the input node from the broad phase bounding volume tree is completely occluded by an occluder node previously rendered by Process(btDbvtNode, float).

        The node may or may not be a leaf node, i.e. may or may not contain a single collision object. If the node is not a leaf (i.e. an internal node), and the node is occluded, the child nodes it contains will not be processed or checked for occlusion, since they are contained in this parent node bounding volume and must therefore also be occluded.

        Overrides:
        Descent in class com.badlogic.gdx.physics.bullet.collision.ICollide
        Parameters:
        node - A node from the broad phase bounding volume tree.
        Returns:
        False if the node is completely occluded, true otherwise.

      • Process

        public void Process(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.bullet.collision.btDbvtNode leaf,
                    float depth)
        Callback for btDbvt.collideOCL(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.bullet.collision.btDbvtNode, com.badlogic.gdx.physics.bullet.linearmath.btVector3, java.nio.FloatBuffer, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector3, int, com.badlogic.gdx.physics.bullet.collision.ICollide, boolean), which will trigger a call to this method if a leaf node is not occluded. If the node contains an object which can occlude others, it will be added to the depth buffer so that it may be considered in future occlusion checks.

        Only box shaped occluder objects are supported.

        Overrides:
        Process in class com.badlogic.gdx.physics.bullet.collision.ICollide
        Parameters:
        leaf - A leaf node which contains a collision object.
        depth - The depth of the node along the sorting axis. Objects closer to the camera will have a value closer to zero.
